metadata.description: Surrendered to his desire, Houshou did something regretful to Saotome, his high school senior in the soccer club. Their relationship turned cold until they reunited again 8 years later. Houshou, now a number one host, unintentionally lives in the same apartment where Saotome works as a caretaker. Houshou still feels this strange awkwardness when he looks at Saotome. But Saotome's kindness never changes, and Houshou finally realized why he did "that" 8 years ago...
metadata.name: I Can't Help Falling in Love (Yaoi / BL Manga)
